      • bindLifecycleListener

        public com.google.inject.binder.LinkedBindingBuilder<LifecycleListener> bindLifecycleListener()
        Use this to bind a LifecycleListener. It internally uses a Multibinder to do the binding so that you can bind multiple LifecycleListeners
        Returns:
        a binding builder used to add a new element in the set.
